mapper.select: select kpi.CELL_NAME as cellName, count(kpi.LTE_SC_RSRP) as sampleNum, count( CASE when kpi.LTE_SC_RSRP < -110 then 1 END) as xBelowNegative110, count(CASE when kpi.LTE_SC_RSRP >= -110 and kpi.LTE_SC_RSRP < -95 then 1 END) as xBetweenNegative110And95, count(CASE when kpi.LTE_SC_RSRP >=-95 and kpi.LTE_SC_RSRP < -80 then 1 END) as xBetweenNegative95And80, count(CASE when kpi.LTE_SC_RSRP >= -80 then 1 END) as xOnNegative80 from RNO_LTE_KPI_DATA kpi left outer join rno_lte_cell lteCell on kpi.CELL_ID = lteCell.CELL_ID where kpi.CELL_ID= #{param2} and TIME_STAMP BETWEEN #{param3} and #{param4} and lteCell.AREA_ID= #{param1} group by kpi.CELL_NAME
